title: Privacy happens
description: Your data is encrypted on your device before it ever leaves. No one can read it—not even us.

stages.label: On Your Device
stages.detail: Your data remains in its original, readable form on your device until you share it

stages.label: Encrypted locally
stages.detail: End-to-end encryption happens client-side before anything is transmitted

stages.label: Unreadable to us
stages.detail: Even our servers can't decrypt or read your content — true zero-knowledge architecture

stages.label: Automatically erased
stages.detail: No permanent storage means no long-term data breach exposure

stages.label: Decrypted privately
stages.detail: Decryption happens only on the recipient's device with the unique link key
